transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Yes sir.

Executive: One minute hello.

Customer: Yeah hello.

Executive: This is speaking from IndiaMART.

Customer: Yes yes please.

Executive: Madam regarding a call from registered.

Customer: Okay so what can we do?

Executive: Madam she said two weeks amount. Two weeks amount used the amount and rest of the amount you will get refund.

Customer: Yes.

Executive: Two weeks used amount she will deduct and remaining amount she will amount she will refund.

Customer: Yes yes sir told me.

Executive: Aur any other concern sir?

Customer: Hello madam actually it will take one week again.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: She said approximately one week it will take so how much amount it will get refund same as madam.

Executive: Yeah kindly confirm me tomorrow sir.

Customer: Okay fine.

Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Refund amount and time confirmation.

- Wants to know the exact refund amount.



Resolution:

- Explained refund process and timeline.

- Asked to confirm the refund amount tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will confirm the refund amount tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, amount, timeline
